Title: Provides for a review process of proposals to alienate municipal parkland
Summary: Provides for a review process of proposals to alienate municipal parkland; requires replacement lands to be of similar or greater acreage and fair market value than the parcel to be alienated and that the proposed review contain a discussion of the replacement parkland's proximity to the parkland being alienated; makes related provisions.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to providing for a review process of proposals to alienate municipal parkland
